price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߣߐ߬ ߢߌ߲߬ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߒ߬ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߏ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߕߐ߬ߢߍ߰ߒߕߋ ߟߎ߬ ߘߏ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߘߋ߬
arabic: قَالُواْ مَن فَعَلَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَآ إِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qālū man faʿala hādhā biālihatinā innahu lamina al-ẓālimīna
